name: Ruler's Reign
description:
Made for the Dream Diary Jam. An experiment in the Godot game engine.

There's an endless rain in her dreams, and only one way to stop it.

--

Controls:

Accept/Interact: Z/space/enter/return

Cancel: X/escape

Movement: WASD/arrow keys

Use effect: 1/num1/E

Stop using effect: 3/num3/R

Drop effect (in the grey bedroom while equipped): 5/num5/F

Wake up: 9/num9/Q
